items.sentence: Tom Jackson was born in Boston on October 20, 1995.
Tom fell asleep during the show at the planetarium.
Tom finally managed to do what he was trying to do.
There\'s something else I want to discuss with you.
Tom might be better at French than you think he is.
Tom never did regain his memory after the accident.
Tom opened the door and asked Mary if she was busy.
Tom asked Mary if she\'d go to John\'s art exhibit.
Tom didn\'t have to go there if he didn\'t want to.
Tom decided to give up trying to keep up with Mary.
